Reviews.Title: “great location, superb sun terrace”
Reviews.Author: scrumhalves
Reviews.Content: brilliant location stroll major sights birdseye view marathon balcony major winning feature roof terrace bearings realised roman forum colloseum st peters vatican city unbeatable spot sip wine views sunset downside interior hotel faded glory shabby chic travelling friends shared opinion bit character didnt blandness chain hotel staff friendly breakfast choice generous facelift popular

Reviews.Title: “Great location, ok hotel.”
Reviews.Author: NeilPatel84
Reviews.Content: hotel superb location easy walk tourist sites rome roof terrace nice touch apart pretty basic breakfast ok special clean bit dated pay amazing city spending time hotel

Reviews.Title: “A Soulless Place”
Reviews.Author: GlastonburySunshine
Reviews.Content: stayed nights sicily location hotel excellent thats hotel lacks soul flowers pictures plenty mosquitoes guest lounge plants corner hotel pots windows shook plants flew mosquitoes plants breeding grounds adequate air conditioning kept comfortable night breakfast adequate teacoffee machine hot drinks pretty lousy choose stay hotel energy cares loves money machine

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel close to the some of the important sites of Rome.”
Reviews.Author: Rome2010_10
Reviews.Content: husband friends stayed pace april fairly roomy rome standards clean rooftop terrace fabulous views convenient main attractions volcano erupting causing severe flight cancellations hotel personnel gracious helpful extended reservations days late getting rome kept updated conditions airport recommend hotel looking reasonable price cleanliness convenient location negative comment airconditioners italy somewhat aware street noise outside balcony remedied earplugs

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location.”
Reviews.Author: Nicole49
Reviews.Content: husband returned 5 days rome pick hotel centre rome easily walk sites ok bedrooms arent huge re spend time anyway theres lovely little roof garden afternoon hard days sight seeing glass wine mini market round corner bought bottle chilled wine everyday breakfast hotel wasnt british standards par course standard hotel selection cold meats cheeses fruit freshly baked bread staff brilliant especially couldnt help highly recommend hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location but simple hotel”
Reviews.Author: Traveller3Brazil
Reviews.Content: hotel worth location steps fontana di trevi coliseum roman forum simple spacious couple child clean beds comfortable bathroom spacious shower looked ones cruise ship breakfast simple options choose staff friendly helpful despite negative aspects recommend location excellent walking caught bus close hotel vatican eat close hotel fontana di trevi mainly pizzas slices ice creams dont forget terrace upper floor youll nice view city
